message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique and valuable item. I believe it's worth a substantial amount, and I'm willing to start with an offer of $1200000.
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit overpriced. I'm willing to pay $1000000 for it. Can you consider my offer?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I'm willing to consider your offer, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $1000000. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1100000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $1100000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers, so I'll offer $1050000. Can you consider this?

I'm glad we're getting closer, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers, so I'll propose $1075000. I think this is a fair price for the product, considering its value and uniqueness.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'll make one more offer: $1050000. If you're willing to accept this, I'll make a deal. If not, I'll have to consider buying from John.
